item.description:
"Americans have become among the sickliest, most overweight generation in the history of the human race. Our children's generation can expect a shocking increase in early life mortality. The primary reason?..."

Hi everyone!

I invite you to see this amazing movie to find out the true answers for a better health.

Please come over to watch and discuss this transformational story of a guy healing himself from a painful autoimmune condition with plain fruits, vegetables and juice fasting.

He did something radical in order to give his body a chance to detoxify and heal itself,

and the body responded in a miraculous way!

---------------------------------------------------------------

TO ALL THOSE PEOPLE BRAVE ENOUGH TO TRY

"FAT, SICK AND NEARLY DEAD" is a perfect to movie to watch and get inspired for a

life-changing experience!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I periodically give myself a reboot too and can share my own healing experience with

fasting and exercises.

The detailed description about the followup program,

Detoxify Your Body with Juice Fasting and Simple Exercises,

and tips for the preparation steps

will be given as handouts after the discussion.

See you soon!

Angela

Price: $10.00
item.name: Movie-night "FAT, SICK AND NEARLY DEAD"
